abstract: HSBC North America Holdings has been ordered to improve its compliance with money-laundering laws, federal regulators said Thursday.
snippet: HSBC North America Holdings has been ordered to improve its compliance with money-laundering laws, federal regulators said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: HSBC North America Holdings has been ordered to improve its compliance with money-laundering laws, federal regulators said Thursday, The Associated Press reports.

headline.main: HSBC Told to Increase Money-Laundering Controls
